name: Shadow Robot

The story of the game: An army entered a country in 1948 and a war erupted between it and the people of the country and a war that will last for a long time until the year 2015. In this year, an army set up a company to develop robots for war, but in the year 2027, the people of the country succeeded in hacking one of the robots inside a company whose goal is to destroy the company
